## Carry Recipe
_Hip Kangaroo Carry - Base Size Minus 2 or Base Size Minus 3_

- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on hip
- Shoulder flip bottom rail to top on your shoulder
- Cross diagonally on back and bring other tail around waist and TUB
